briefTitle: Breast Cancer Education to Prisoner Women
officialTitle: The Effect of Breast Cancer Education Given to Prisoner Women on Breast Cancer Knowledge and Awareness
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Volunteering to participate in the study,
* Being between the ages of 18-65,
* No history of breast cancer,
* To know Turkish.

Exclusion Criteria:

* Those who do not agree to participate in the study,
* Having a history of breast cancer,
* Those who do not speak Turkish
